about_the_game:
Night of the Assassins - you will find yourself in the role of a mysterious killer, able to manipulate the shadow and hide in it in order to approach your enemies unnoticed. Your character is a master of stealth and the art of assassination, who is legendary. Plunge into the dark world of assassins and killers, where every corner is teeming with danger. Your task is to fight enemies from the shadows using agility and killing skills. Make your way through intricate levels, solve puzzles and uncover secrets to reach your goal.

The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Destroy enemies in the location to move further through the levels.

Prepare for an exciting adventure in a world of shadows and intrigue, where your stealth and skill will become your strongest ally.

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Interesting locations
- Various enemies

name: Night of the Assassins

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
